response.overview: Hazel is a survival thriller set in Center, ND in 1920. Based on the incredible true story, it follows the Miner children – Hazel, Emmet, and Myrdith – as they struggle to make it home from school after a gentle March snowfall suddenly transforms into a furious blizzard. When the kids become lost in the blinding wind and snow, Hazel must keep her younger siblings alive in the face of impossible odds as their parents and friends hunt desperately for the children before it’s too late.
response.title: Hazel
